Index.title: ini english halo world!
Index.desc-movie: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa falls into the hands of a great biker horde led by the warlord Dementus

Detail.description: In the heart of a bustling metropolis stands a towering skyscraper, an architectural marvel that houses the hopes and dreams of its inhabitants. But within its sleek facade lies a dark secret, one that threatens to unravel the lives of those who dare to enter.
